Mail. ****** *** **** ************* ***** *** ***** She explained in detail about my dental problem and the solution for the same. 

While most of the dentist charge you excessively, she is the most reasonable one I was recommended in Soutj Bombay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly, easy process, the doctor and staff made sure my child was relaxed and at ease before starting the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Dr. Varsha since the past 5+ years for our son. She is very patient friendly and diligent in providing dental healthcare services. Recently we visited her for some infection in the gums. It was extremely reassuring to see all the safety precautions and measures taken specially during covid-19, for all patients and staff. We felt in safe hands. Will recommend Crown Corner for all dental treatments!

The process was extremely smooth despite all the new guidelines for covid.. From gloves for the feet and hands to sanitisers and masks for the patient  the doctor and the staff there... Plus we were the only patient at that time..  Highly recommended to anyone
reply_text: Thankyou Ratni....we are humbled by your testimonial...

review: Excellent experience. The doctor is very good and takes good care of her patients. She is also very good and patient with kids which is a great plus point. She is not the types of offer un-necessary medication or treatment. you can trust her with what she suggests and go ahead with full faith.

I had a severe pain in my lower left molar when I visited her. I am happy and satisfied the way she handled and explained me the issue and guided me well. Seems she has good experience and knows her job well.
She is well equipped with knowledge and latest state of art equipments.
Overall great experience and happy that my friends recommended her.

The doctor was amazing. She was very patient and immediately engaged with my kids. The clinic was very child friendly and my kids were very comfortable. She also made the effort to ensure that my kids were not intimidated and explained exactly what she was doing in a very fun way so that they did not resist. She explained everything to me in detail and was happy to answer all my questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I found Dr Varsha very dedicated, thoughtful, compassionate and thorough with her work. 
Her professional skills are so competent. 
I had a very healthy outcome of my visit… alongwith it being  stress-free and pleasant.

Wow ! Dr Varsha is  so gentle . I was so comfortable when she was working . Appreciate her honesty on all my dental related queries , and worked on only the tooth that needed attention.
Very sincere . 
I highly recommend  her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Varsha is very professional and child friendly she is also very good with explaining the health issue. Very satisfied.

I have seen Dr. Varsha a few times earlier for regular cleaning etc. for my children. I always found her professional, great with children and very good with her work. My 8 year old recently chipped her permanent incisors and we called her for an emergency. Dr. Varsha opened her clinic for her on a Sunday and did just a great job. Although it was not a trivial procedure and local anaesthesia was required, my daughter did not cry one bit and was really comfortable through the procedure.
Dr. Varsha makes it a point to talk to the children and parents to explain every step. Her premises is immaculately clean and has the latest equipment. 
I would recommend her to anyone for regular dental work and also for any complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is brilliant, warm and doesn't dismiss any query as unimportant. She always explains the treatment in detail and checks up on me every now and then. Crown corner is clean, conveniently located and even the staff is extremely friendly. I did not imagine that I would be this excited about getting adult braces!

She is fantastic with kids and the whole experience with my 4 year old was great ! He was apprehensive about a dental appointment before we met Dr. Varsha , but later he didn't want to leave the clinic !!

As always it was a very good experience. The follow up is excellent and it helps to have guidance even when one back home and the next day. The clinic and doctor personally follow up to check on the progress.
Dr is very talented and makes one feel comfortable. The clinic and equipments are state of the art and clean. Fabulous experience overall.

The doctor was very goodbwith children and could treat my 3.5 year old with zero resistance. The gift is very thoughtful and ensures that the child is looking forward to his next visit- in fact wants to go back asap! Thanks doctor.
Fabulous! It's an absolute at-home feeling!  Whatever is said would not be enough to express our wonderful experience with Dr. Varsha
My kids love the place and the doctors too. The staff too is very courteous and helpful! I would definitely recommend this place to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were extremely happy with the overall experience with the clinic and doctor Varsha who was very gentle and kind
